original_title: แดนศักสิทธิ์
overview: A feature film compiled from sex tapes recorded by the two directors. Besides being brimming with the passion of memories, personal history, and body language, the film reflects a 20-year generation gap, and captures vernacular Thai communication: a babble of pillow talk and evasive language that masks true feelings. The film documents a six-year relationship in which mutual trust is slowly replaced by isolation and estrangement.
title: Avalon
